meta.title: From BIG to EARS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: This weekend, I attended my first [Big Ears Music Festival](https://bigearsfestival.org/) in Knoxville, TN. Over four days, my family and I saw something close to 50 incredible artists.
